answers.author: Gregory Crocker
answers.text:
I always operated under the policy that Federal Express had under Fred Smith which was every customer receives a reply the same day the call/e-mail was received, even if the answer is, "We are still looking into that for you."

answers.author: Amanda Relyea
answers.text:
Whether you decide same day, one day, or two day, it is a great idea to communicate it in the voice mail greeting, e-mail auto reply, and/or signature block. Personally, I strive for same day, but my voice mail says I'll return all urgent calls within one business day and all other calls within one or two business days. This prevents multiple calls from the same person on those days when you have back to back meetings, and it also seems to work well for callers because they don't have to wonder when they'll hear back.
